explains: n. 教学大纲；（罗马天主教会用教令宣布的）事项举要

sentences.en: I was given a free hand in designing the syllabus.
sentences.cn: 我获准全权制订教学大纲。

sentences.en: We need to design a new syllabus for the third year.
sentences.cn: 我们需要为三年级学生制订一个新的课程大纲。

sentences.en: The syllabus prescribes precisely which books should be studied.
sentences.cn: 教学大纲明确规定了哪些是必读的书。
